argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_0p1e1 | |- ( 0 + 1 ) = 1 |
| 2 | 1 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( A FallFac ( 0 + 1 ) ) = ( A FallFac 1 ) |
| 3 |  | #P_0nn0 | |- 0 e. NN0 |
| 4 |  | #P_fallfacp1 | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ 0 e. NN0 ) -> ( A FallFac ( 0 + 1 ) ) = ( ( A FallFac 0 ) x. ( A - 0 ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A FallFac ( 0 + 1 ) ) = ( ( A FallFac 0 ) x. ( A - 0 ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fallfac0 | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A FallFac 0 ) = 1 ) |
| 7 |  | #P_subid1 | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A - 0 ) = A ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( A FallFac 0 ) x. ( A - 0 ) ) = ( 1 x. A ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_mulid2 | |- ( A e. CC -> ( 1 x. A ) = A ) |
| 10 | 5, 8, 9 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A FallFac ( 0 + 1 ) ) = A ) |
| 11 | 2, 10 | #P_syl5eqr | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A FallFac 1 ) = A ) |
